Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Miniature tube-shaped vase with a flat circular bottom, a small flared foot and a body that bulges at the bottom and narrows near the top. There are accumulations of clay on certain areas of the foot. Forty-seven vessels of this type were found in the same foundation deposit.
